section_title: †Appointment of clerk assistant confirmed, and future clerks assistant to be appointed by Her Majesty.
section_text: 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .   the clerk assistant and second clerk assistant of the House of Commons respectively shall be appointed by Her Majesty, by warrant under her Royal Sign Manual; and every clerk assistant and second clerk assistant shall be removable only by Her Majesty, upon an address of the House of Commons to Her Majesty for that purpose.
